name: Violet Dawn
description:
Project created in Unreal Engine by artist Millie Harris for Experimental Game Design course. For the project I took on other development roles including programmer, designer, audio designer, and composer.

Play as a fox leaving their den for the first time in the magical fantasy environment game, Violet Dawn! Discover the trails left behind by other animals who may not exist anymore. Players experience the world from a 3rd person animal’s point of view and with this new perspective can learn to have a better appreciation of nature. 

Controls: WASD and mouse camera movement, hold left click to inspect, space to jump, escape to pause, mouse button 3 to zoom.
